channel.title: The RSC community will die
channel.description:
Unless someone hosts a good server. As it seems, there's no IT gurus who can handle their server more than 1 week. Low xp rates, extra "big boss npc's" etc. Why wouldn't someone just host a server with like 30x xp rate, sharks in bank, pots in shop. Weapons, armour from dragons etc. Different training spots with 2x more Npc's.
Best wishes, Natalja

item.title: The RSC community will die
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:13, topic:457181”][quote author=Pompano21 link=topic=560115.msg4091255#msg4091255 date=1346384469]

[quote author=NoLives link=topic=560115.msg4090867#msg4090867 date=1346342794]

30x exp rates and stupid drops is not going to help the community…

Releasing your server will, bring it on…

When it’s ready (which /should/ be any day now)
[/quote]inb4 it’s not released, as happened to mopar.
Another prediction on the spot for me?

inb4 you are wrong
[/quote]Hey, I said on my mopar prediction aswell, I HOPE it gets released, the earlier the better.
I will definitely play it.[/quote]

The BETA is online.

Read full topic

item.title: The RSC community will die
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

[quote=“imnoob122, post:1, topic:457181”]Unless someone hosts a good server. As it seems, there’s no IT gurus who can handle their server more than 1 week.
Low xp rates, extra “big boss npc’s” etc.
Why wouldn’t someone just host a server with like 30x xp rate, sharks in bank, pots in shop.
Weapons, armour from dragons etc. Different training spots with 2x more Npc’s.

Best wishes,
Natalja[/quote]

Sick of seeing statements like this, Dont you get High XP rate servers killed the community, We ruined it ourselves. When you have slow exp rates, You have a game that will keep you occupied for ever, With yourself aiming for goals constantly. What do you do once you’ve maxed out in 1 week, got enough supplies to last you a lifetime and every account possible you could make to pk with from levles 1 - 123. Yes, You get bored. Like the rest of the community did.

Read full topic

item.title: The RSC community will die
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

I guess your right, is there is something we all know about the future is that our mortal body is gonna be gone. Maybe is better to worry of what will happen next.

27 And as it is appointed for men to die once, but after this the judgment, 28 so Christ was offered once to bear the sins of many. To those who eagerly wait for Him He will appear a second time, apart from sin, for salvation.
28 And do not fear those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. But rather fear Him who is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.
For what will it profit a man if he gains the whole world, and loses his own soul? 37 Or what will a man give in exchange for his soul?

Read full topic

item.title: The RSC community will die
item.dc:creator: @management management
item.description:
@management wrote:

because we’ve seen so many of these servers, they ARE the servers that last 1 week. everyone gets bored, no one donates for a proper ddos protected server (which i haven’t seen a server that hasn’t got ddosed), so it’s really just a waste to do that kind of server.

Read full topic
